title: 300 Damage Jax, Intentionally Bans My Intended Pick, Refuses To Help Team All Game, AFK's In Base.
body:
https://i.imgsafe.org/e5/e52f9aceb4.jpeg

How much you want to bet this guy will never get punished by Riot? Any takers?

replies.body: Assuming you mean "people who bet," that'd be "bettors" (although "any takers" is a more common phrasing in this context).

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=gk5K4fb0,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-05-05T03:13:29.376+0000)
>
> Assuming you mean "people who bet," that'd be "bettors" (although "any takers" is a more common phrasing in this context).

Well, I certainly did not know that. Learned something new today.
If they weren't toxic in chat then the chances of them getting banned are slim to none... basically how the system works currently
